modName: Lanterns for Caravans - Wearable Lanterns Add-On
summary: This mod is an add-on for Wearable Lanterns that gives hand-held Travel and Torchbug Lanterns to Khajiiti caravan traders that travel the roads of Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Fft8D.png[/IMG][/center]

[b]Author: Chesko[/b]

[b]		Contact:	Forums - Chesko[/b]
[b]				E-mail - chesko.tesmod@gmail.com[/b]

[u][center][b][color=#FBEC5D][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17416]Please direct all comments to the Wearable Lanterns main page. The discussion thread on this page has been disabled. Thanks.[/url][/color][/b][/center][/u]

This mod is an add-on for Wearable Lanterns that gives hand-held Travel and Torchbug Lanterns to Khajiiti caravan traders that travel the roads of Skyrim. Even though Khajiit can see in the dark, you\'d figure they\'d want to carry something at night just for safety. They normally don\'t even carry torches!

[center][b][color=#FBEC5D][size=5]Features[/size][/color][/b][/center]

This mod uses reference aliases to give various lanterns to the following Khajiit caravan traders:

[b]Ri\'saad
Atahbah
Ahkari
Dro\'marash
Ma\'dran
Khayla
Kharjo
Ra\'zhinda[/b]

Using reference aliases means that I don\'t edit these traders directly, to ensure compatibility with other mods that might edit these traders.

In my experience, they don\'t use their lanterns much (if at all) when camping, only when traveling the road.

[center][b][color=#FBEC5D][size=5]Installation[/size][/color][/b][/center]

If you opt for the No BSA version of Wearable Lanterns and/or Lanterns for Caravans, you may get a message warning you about overwriting the following files:

_WL_lampgeneric01.dds
_WL_lampgeneric01_n.dds
_WL_FXFirefly.dds
_WL_FXFirefly_g.dds
_WL_FXFirefly_n.dds
_WL_WearableTorchbugMesh_Held.nif

These are OK to overwrite. They are simply a copy of the lantern textures that are packaged with Wearable Lanterns. For compatibility reasons I needed to redistribute them with this add-on as well.

[center][b][color=#FBEC5D][size=5]Uninstallation[/size][/color][/b][/center]

No special procedure. Just uninstall.

[center][b][color=#FBEC5D][size=5]Requirements[/size][/color][/b][/center]

REQUIRES Wearable Lanterns 2.2 or newer.
REQUIRES Skyrim 1.7.7.0 or newer.

Load order should not matter, but it\'s probably a good idea to load this after Wearable Lanterns.

[center][b][color=#FBEC5D][size=5]Known Issues[/size][/color][/b][/center]

None.

[center][b][color=#FBEC5D][size=5]Troubleshooting[/size][/color][/b][/center]

\"The caravaners aren\'t carrying lanterns when traveling at night.\"

Verify that you meet the requirements as stated above.

[center][b][color=#FBEC5D][size=5]Compatibility[/size][/color][/b][/center]

Compatible with everything, including mods that edit the Khajiit caravan traders. I use reference aliases to populate their inventories with the lanterns, meaning I don\'t actually edit the traders themselves.
author: Chesko
